column4: if u compile ur own u will loose supprot from ubuntu updates
sound was working while i used the 386 kernel
but smp wasnt, nvidia driver were not working, now i fixed it and i can boot with the generic kernel
but since the first boot sound doesnt work anymore
Astaroth to have smp u need to pic the write cd to install from but there is another way
i'm using a terratec aureon 5.1 usb mkii / usb-audio
hold on i have a post deep somewhere
the generic kernel supports smp, so that problem is solved
there's just my sound issue remaining
the sound config in gnome recongnizes the soundcard but there's just no sound output
i'm using the generic kernel, no need for a patch, but thanks ;)
